# Create

**Static Method**

Allocates and initializes an instance of the audio stream class.

## Declaration

```swift
static OSSharedPtr<IOUserAudioStream> Create(IOUserAudioDriver * in_driver, IOUserAudioStreamDirection in_direction, IOMemoryDescriptor * in_io_memory_descriptor);
```

## Parameters

- **in_driver**: The [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioDriver] that owns this object.
- **in_direction**: A `IOUserAudioStreamDirection` for the stream’s direction: input or output.
- **in_io_memory_descriptor**: A pointer to a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/IOMemoryDescriptor]. The stream maps the descriptor’s buffer to the host for doing audio I/O.

## Return Value

A poiner to an [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioStream], if allocation and initialization succeeded.

## Discussion

If you subclass [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioStream] to override this class’ behavior, don’t use [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioStream/Create] to allocate and initialize the custom subclass.

## Creating an Audio Stream

- **init**: Initializes an instance of the audio stream class.
- **IOUserAudioDriver**: A DriverKit provider object that manages communications with an audio device.
